verses.name: Luke 7:42
verses.text: And when they had nothing to pay, he frankly forgave them both. Tell me therefore, which of them will love him most?

verses.name: Luke 7:43
verses.text: Simon answered and said, I suppose that he, to whom he forgave most. And he said unto him, Thou hast rightly judged.

verses.name: Luke 7:44
verses.text: And he turned to the woman, and said unto Simon, Seest thou this woman? I entered into thine house, thou gavest me no water for my feet: but she hath washed my feet with tears, and wiped them with the hairs of her head.
